options.A: Lean / Thin body- long and narrow (Vata)
options.B: Well-built, solid body-moderately developed physique, and proportional. (Pitta)
options.C: Plump, slight obese, robust body- bigger bones, broad shoulders and hips (Kapha)

options.B: Medium, soft, loose. (Pitta)
options.C: Large, thick, well-built, lubricated. (Kapha)

options.A: Many Veins Prominent (Vata): Veins are very visible and prominent due to thin skin
options.B: Moderately Visible Veins (Pitta): Veins are moderately visible, especially during physical activity, with average skin thickness.
options.C: Less Visible Veins (Kapha): Veins are less visible due to thicker skin

options.B: Red eyes, Sharp, bright, sensitive to light (Pitta)
options.C: White eyes and big (Kapha)

options.A: Medium, sensitive gums that bleed easily. (Vata)
options.B: Small, may protrude, thin gums, tend to recede. (Pitta)
options.C: Light pink, thick, strong gums. (Kapha)

options.A: Dry Skin (Vata): Skin is rough, flaky, and lacks moisture
options.B: Warm Skin (Pitta): Skin is warm to the touch, smooth with a natural glow.
options.C: Moist Skin, Sweats Easily (Kapha): Skin is moist and smooth, with a tendency to sweat more and appear oily.

options.A: Rough Hair (Vata): Hair is dry, coarse, and brittle, often feeling rough and looking dull.
options.B: Sparse Hair (Pitta): Hair is thin and less dense, with possible thinning areas.
options.C: Thick Hair (Kapha): Hair is dense, full-bodied, and well-lubricated, with a smooth texture and abundant volume.

options.B: Smooth and thin nails (Pitta)
options.C: Low nail growth, thick, smooth nails (Kapha)

options.B: Clear cut and moderate talking (Pitta)
options.C: Smooth and slow Voice (Kapha)

options.B: Strong appetite (Pitta)
options.C: Low appetite (Kapha)

options.B: Low thirst (Pitta)
options.C: Sometimes I'm thirsty, sometimes I forget to drink water (Kapha)

options.B: Moderate and required movement (Pitta)
options.C: Slow movement (Kapha)

options.A: Irregular Bowel Movements (Vata): Inconsistent and variable, with hard, dry stools
options.B: Soft Bowel Movements (Pitta): Regular but soft to loose stools
options.C: Medium Bowel Movements (Kapha): Regular, well-formed, and moderately frequent stools, with smooth and easy passage.

options.A: Light sleeper (Vata)- Irregular, light, tends towards insomnia.
options.B: Medium sleep (Pitta)- Moderate, may wake up but will fall asleep again.
options.C: Heavy sleeper (Kapha)- Deep, prolonged, difficulty waking up.

options.B: Medium strength (Pitta)
options.C: High strength (Kapha)

options.B: Cold, Sweet, bitter, pungent (Pitta)
options.C: Hot, Pungent, bitter, pungent (Kapha)

options.A: Atheist (Vata): Restless and curious mind, open to unconventional ideas and changing beliefs frequently.
options.B: Intelligent (Pitta): Sharp, analytical mind, driven by a desire for knowledge, with strong logical reasoning and decisiveness.
options.C: Steadfast (Kapha): Calm, stable, and loyal mind, with a deep sense of commitment, reflecting deeply and valuing stability in beliefs and decisions.

options.B: Emotional, caring (Pitta)
options.C: Firm (Kapha)

options.B: Excellent memory (Pitta)
options.C: Good memory but sometimes forget (Kapha)

options.A: Quick to Anger (Vata): Anger arises quickly and impulsively, but is short-lived
options.B: Quick to Start, Intense Anger (Pitta): Anger is intense and arises quickly, with strong, direct expressions.
options.C: Calm and Patient (Kapha): Slow to anger, maintaining a calm and patient demeanor.

options.B: Stubborn, Can't Forgive (Pitta): Intense and competitive jealousy
options.C: Able to Bear Stress (Kapha): Experiences less jealousy, maintaining a calm, resilient, and supportive demeanor.

options.A: Talks a lot: I’m talkative and I speak quickly. (Vata)
options.B: Stubborn: I like to convince and I can be argumentative. (Pitta)
options.C: Peaceful: I don’t speak that often, but when I do I speak slowly. (Kapha)
